metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20337 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: There is a stack-based buffer overflow in the parse_makernote function ofdcraw_common.cpp in LibRaw 0.19.1. Crafted input will lead to a denial ofservice or possibly unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: ufraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
